title: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson perform provocative dance routine in their bathroom
text:
They're young, good looking and seriously smitten - and it's clear Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson want the world to know it.

On Monday, the couple took to social media app TikTok to share a video of themselves dancing in their bathroom.

The footage kicked off with Miley and Cody lip syncing to STUPID (feat. Yung Baby Tate) by Ashnikko.

Lip sync for your life! On Monday, Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson took to social media app TikTok to share a video of themselves dancing in their bathroom

The pair then enthusiastically waved their hands in the air while gyrating their hips from side to side.

The Wrecking Ball singer, 26, rocked out in a lacy black bra and tight bicycle shorts.

Her 22-year-old boyfriend dressed casually in a Harley-Davidson T-shirt and a relaxed pair of draw-string shorts.

This beat is technotronic: The footage kicked off with Miley and Cody lip syncing to STUPID (feat. Yung Baby Tate) by Ashnikko

High energy: The pair then enthusiastically waved their hands in the air while gyrating their hips from side to side

It's not the first time the couple have shared goofy videos to TikTok, a platform which is popular with their younger fans.

On Sunday, Cody uploaded another clip of the pair dancing to Shania Twain's '90s ballad You're Still the One.

The Australian hitmaker later posted the footage to his Instagram Story, telling his fans to follow him on TikTok for 'premium' content.

Premium content: On Sunday, Cody uploaded another clip of the pair dancing to Shania Twain's '90s ballad You're Still the One

It comes after Cody told Australian radio show Fitzy & Wippa he used to have a childhood crush on Miley 'would kiss her on the TV screen when [he] was little.'

He added: 'She was the only one that I had ever felt that way about when I was that age. I had a crush on her ever since I knew who she was.'

The couple began dating just two months after Miley announced her separation from Liam Hemsworth, whom she married in a private ceremony on December 23, 2018.
description: They're young, good looking and seriously smitten - and it's clear Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson want the world to know it.
authors: Shannon Shipley For Daily Mail Australia
